Title: Chasing the Devil's Tail
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Carina Adly MacKenzie, Christopher Hollier, L.J. Smith (character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries"), Marguerite MacIntyre (story)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Going after everything Esther loves. Klaus and Hayley seek an antidote for Elijah in the bayou assisted by Marcel and Josh. Kaleb takes Davina to an old hangout.
